parameters.name: ミンミンゼミが鳴く雑木林

parameters: When I entered my sister’s room,
I found her sprawled on the bed like a
had clearly made its way into the house,
hitting me as soon as I stepped in.
This won’t do—I've got to figure out a way
to help her beat the heat!

parameters.name: 明るくて可愛いチェレスタのジングル

parameters: I ended up taking care of my sister,
who was on the verge of heatstroke,
My sister and I started desperately
but the relentless heatwave left us
She stopped paying attention to me
and frantically fanned the hem of her shirt.
>图片快捷操作 : 批量图片[6,7,8] : 修改单属性 : 透明度[0] : 时间[45]
>独立开关 : 事件[31] : A : 开启
\nl< >"It's so hot... I just want to take a bath..."
It’s too hot to squeeze in with someone else!"
\nl< >"Geez! Stop joking around at a time like this!"
Fair enough... It is summer, after all.
But still... it feels a little lonely.

parameters.name: 明るくて可愛いチェレスタのジングル

parameters: We ended up taking turns cooling off
in the bath after sweating buckets,
it wasn’t long before we were sweating again.
sweaty struggle dragged on until evening...
I crept quietly to the doorway of my sister's room.
I had thought she’d be napping,
Clearly thinking no one was home,
she’d completely let her guard down,
not caring how exposed her posture looked.
she’d even taken off her panties
I felt a little guilty about lingering,
so I quietly left the doorway
and headed back to the entrance.
I quickly grabbed a popsicle and devoured it,
feeling my body temperature drop noticeably.
and the heatwave still pressed down relentlessly,
but at least I no longer felt like
I was about to roast alive.
Meanwhile, my sister, still apparently too warm,
was lazily sprawled out on the floor,
It wasn’t exactly the most ladylike posture,
and I felt like I should probably
But my attention kept getting snagged
the air in the room quickly started flowing,
don’t sit right in front of the fan like that!
